name: The only NeOne
description:
"The only NeOne" is a Grid based Maze game. Clear levels by reaching the exit, but there's a twist! You can only press and hold your move commands ONCE. Study the enemy's patterns, keep track of your paths you take and figure out how to reach the exit!

Instructions:

Move: DPad / Arrow Keys

Back to menu: Start / Escape

Restart: Select / R

Confirm: A / Return
